summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff discussing coordination for an upcoming meeting with Brad Weinshiemer regarding the Epstein case. The emails focus on scheduling a call to align on talking points and drafting an internal update memo on the investigation's status and next steps.

persons.name: Brad Weinshiemer
persons.context: Scheduled to meet with a member of the US Attorney's Office (SDNY) team regarding the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Scheduled meeting with Brad Weinshiemer
events.description: A member of the US Attorney's Office (SDNY) team is scheduled to meet with Brad Weinshiemer.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) was actively working on the Epstein investigation as of April 2019.
The team was preparing an internal update memo detailing the investigation's progress, actions taken since the last update, and next steps.
The communication shows coordination within the prosecution team to ensure alignment before a key meeting.
